description:
WHOLE Apartment, cozy, available for single or couples traveling. It is in a great location in the Upper East Side, close to the Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum, The Met, Central Park, and ten minutes to the 4,5,6 Train. Extremely safe and family friendly- Restaurants everywhere, and a park and terrace in the building. Apartment also has piano and art because I am an artist. As well, the building has laundry room, an outdoor common terrace and two private parks - great for kids.

My apartment is a one bedroom equipped with Wifi, a piano, and good vibes. Full kitchen, bathroom, and a room with Queen size bed and quiet surroundings. The lobby is lux and there is a 3rd floor terrace open to you. Guarantee you will have the best sleep of your life in this healing space!

Whole apartment
name: Amazing Whole Apartment in UES with Piano
review: The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
